mapper.select: SELECT s.id, s.name, s.email, s.contact, s.img, s.birthday, m.mbti, m.comdate, m.digidate, m.rdate, m.detail, m.insta, m.facebook FROM stdn s JOIN my_page m ON s.id = m.id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO my_page (id, mbti, comdate, digidate, rdate, detail, insta, facebook) VALUES (#{id}, #{mbti}, #{comdate, jdbcType=DATE}, #{digidate}, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'yyyy.MM.dd hh24:mi:ss'), #{detail}, #{insta}, #{facebook})
mapper.select: SELECT s.id, s.name, s.email, s.contact, s.img, s.birthday, m.mbti, m.comdate, m.digidate, m.rdate, m.detail, m.insta, m.facebook FROM stdn s JOIN my_page m ON s.id = m.id WHERE m.digidate = #{digidate}
